r2b.apps.utils.cipher

Class SecurePreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • r2b.apps.utils.cipher.SecurePreferences

  • public class SecurePreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class for Android's SharedPreferences interface, which adds a layer of encryption to the persistent storage and retrieval of sensitive key-value pairs of primitive data types.

    This class provides important - but nevertheless imperfect - protection against simple attacks by casual snooper. It is crucial to remember that even encrypted data may still be susceptible to attacks, especially on rooted or stolen devices!
